title: When gold is green
brief_description: Gives a detailed picture of the care associated with tobacco growing in Ontario. Harvested by hand, typed, cured and baled by grade, the crop is marketed, and then stored for 1-3 years before being blended, cut and dehumidified during the highly mechanized process of cigarette manufacture.
